theorem P2_implies_closure_eq_closure_interior {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 A â†’ closure A = closure (interior A) := by
  intro hP2
  -- First, show `closure A âŠ† closure (interior A)`
  have hâ‚ : closure A âŠ† closure (interior A) := by
    -- Since `A âŠ† interior (closure (interior A))` by `P2`
    -- and `interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† closure (interior A)`,
    -- we obtain `A âŠ† closure (interior A)`
    have h_sub : A âŠ† closure (interior A) := by
      intro x hx
      exact interior_subset (hP2 hx)
    exact closure_mono h_sub
  -- Next, show `closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A`
  have hâ‚‚ : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A :=
    closure_mono (interior_subset : interior A âŠ† A)
  exact Set.Subset.antisymm hâ‚ hâ‚‚

import Mathlib
import Aesop

namespace Topology

variable {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]

def P1 (A : Set X) : Prop :=
  A âŠ† closure (interior A)

def P2 (A : Set X) : Prop :=
  A âŠ† interior (closure (interior A))

def P3 (A : Set X) : Prop :=
  A âŠ† interior (closure A)

theorem P2_implies_P1 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 A â†’ Topology.P1 A := by
  intro hP2
  have h_subset : interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† closure (interior A) :=
    interior_subset
  exact hP2.trans h_subset

theorem P2_implies_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 A â†’ Topology.P3 A := by
  intro hP2
  open Set in
  have h_subset : interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† interior (closure A) := by
    have h_closure_mono : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A :=
      closure_mono interior_subset
    exact interior_mono h_closure_mono
  exact hP2.trans h_subset

theorem isOpen_implies_P1 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsOpen A) : Topology.P1 A := by
  dsimp [Topology.P1]
  intro x hx
  have hInt : x âˆˆ interior A := by
    simpa [IsOpen.interior_eq hA] using hx
  exact subset_closure hInt

theorem isOpen_implies_P2 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsOpen A) : Topology.P2 A := by
  dsimp [Topology.P2]
  intro x hx
  have h_nhds_closure : closure A âˆˆ ð“ x := by
    have h_nhdsA : A âˆˆ ð“ x := hA.mem_nhds hx
    exact Filter.mem_of_superset h_nhdsA subset_closure
  have h_mem_closure : x âˆˆ interior (closure A) :=
    (mem_interior_iff_mem_nhds).2 h_nhds_closure
  simpa [hA.interior_eq] using h_mem_closure

theorem isOpen_implies_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hA : IsOpen A) : Topology.P3 A := by
  exact (P2_implies_P3 (X := X) (A := A)) (isOpen_implies_P2 (X := X) (A := A) hA)

theorem interior_closure_interior_subset_closure {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
    {A : Set X} : interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† closure A := by
  open Set in
  have hâ‚ : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A := closure_mono interior_subset
  have hâ‚‚ : interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† interior (closure A) :=
    interior_mono hâ‚
  exact hâ‚‚.trans interior_subset

theorem dense_implies_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X}
    (hDense : Dense A) : Topology.P3 A := by
  dsimp [Topology.P3]
  intro x hx
  have h_closure : closure A = (Set.univ : Set X) := by
    simpa using hDense.closure_eq
  simpa [h_closure, interior_univ]

theorem interior_closure_interior_subset_interior_closure {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
    {A : Set X} : interior (closure (interior A)) âŠ† interior (closure A) := by
  open Set in
  have h_mono : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A :=
    closure_mono interior_subset
  exact interior_mono h_mono

theorem P2_implies_P1_and_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 A â†’ (Topology.P1 A âˆ§ Topology.P3 A) := by
  intro hP2
  exact âŸ¨Topology.P2_implies_P1 (X := X) (A := A) hP2,
         Topology.P2_implies_P3 (X := X) (A := A) hP2âŸ©

theorem interior_has_P1 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 (interior A) := by
  dsimp [Topology.P1]
  intro x hx
  have hIntEq : interior (interior A) = interior A := by
    simpa using (isOpen_interior (A := A)).interior_eq
  have h_closure : x âˆˆ closure (interior A) := subset_closure hx
  simpa [hIntEq] using h_closure

theorem interior_subset_interior_closure_interior {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X]
    {A : Set X} :
    interior A âŠ† interior (closure (interior A)) := by
  intro x hx
  have h_mono : interior (interior A) âŠ† interior (closure (interior A)) :=
    interior_mono subset_closure
  have h_eq : interior (interior A) = interior A := by
    simpa using (isOpen_interior (A := A)).interior_eq
  have hx' : x âˆˆ interior (interior A) := by
    simpa [h_eq] using hx
  exact h_mono hx'

theorem interior_has_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 (interior A) := by
  dsimp [Topology.P3]
  exact Topology.interior_subset_interior_closure_interior (X := X) (A := A)

theorem P1_iff_closure_eq_closure_interior {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 A â†” closure A = closure (interior A) := by
  constructor
  Â· intro hP1
    have hâ‚ : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure A :=
      closure_mono (interior_subset : interior A âŠ† A)
    have hâ‚‚ : closure A âŠ† closure (interior A) := by
      have h_sub : A âŠ† closure (interior A) := hP1
      have h_closed : IsClosed (closure (interior A)) := isClosed_closure
      exact closure_minimal h_sub h_closed
    exact Set.Subset.antisymm hâ‚‚ hâ‚
  Â· intro hEq
    dsimp [Topology.P1]
    intro x hx
    have hx_closure : x âˆˆ closure A := subset_closure hx
    simpa [hEq] using hx_closure

theorem interior_closure_has_P1 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 (interior (closure A)) := by
  have h_open : IsOpen (interior (closure A)) := isOpen_interior
  exact Topology.isOpen_implies_P1 (X := X) (A := interior (closure A)) h_open

theorem interior_closure_has_P2 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 (interior (closure A)) := by
  have h_open : IsOpen (interior (closure A)) := isOpen_interior
  exact Topology.isOpen_implies_P2 (X := X) (A := interior (closure A)) h_open

theorem interior_closure_has_P3 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 (interior (closure A)) := by
  have h_open : IsOpen (interior (closure A)) := isOpen_interior
  exact Topology.isOpen_implies_P3 (X := X) (A := interior (closure A)) h_open

theorem interior_has_P2 {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A : Set X} :
    Topology.P2 (interior A) := by
  dsimp [Topology.P2]
  intro x hx
  have hx' : x âˆˆ interior (closure (interior A)) :=
    Topology.interior_subset_interior_closure_interior (X := X) (A := A) hx
  have hIntInt : interior (interior A) = interior A := by
    simpa using (isOpen_interior (A := A)).interior_eq
  simpa [hIntInt] using hx'

theorem P3_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P3 A â†’ Topology.P3 B â†’ Topology.P3 (A âˆª B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P3] at hA hB âŠ¢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hâ‚ =>
      have hxA : x âˆˆ interior (closure A) := hA hâ‚
      have h_mono : interior (closure A) âŠ† interior (closure (A âˆª B)) := by
        have : closure A âŠ† closure (A âˆª B) := closure_mono (Set.subset_union_left)
        exact interior_mono this
      exact h_mono hxA
  | inr hâ‚‚ =>
      have hxB : x âˆˆ interior (closure B) := hB hâ‚‚
      have h_mono : interior (closure B) âŠ† interior (closure (A âˆª B)) := by
        have : closure B âŠ† closure (A âˆª B) := closure_mono (Set.subset_union_right)
        exact interior_mono this
      exact h_mono hxB

theorem P1_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 A â†’ Topology.P1 B â†’ Topology.P1 (A âˆª B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P1] at hA hB âŠ¢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hAx =>
      have hxA : x âˆˆ closure (interior A) := hA hAx
      have h_subset : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure (interior (A âˆª B)) := by
        have h_int_subset : interior A âŠ† interior (A âˆª B) :=
          interior_mono (Set.subset_union_left)
        exact closure_mono h_int_subset
      exact h_subset hxA
  | inr hBx =>
      have hxB : x âˆˆ closure (interior B) := hB hBx
      have h_subset : closure (interior B) âŠ† closure (interior (A âˆª B)) := by
        have h_int_subset : interior B âŠ† interior (A âˆª B) :=
          interior_mono (Set.subset_union_right)
        exact closure_mono h_int_subset
      exact h_subset hxB

end Topology

theorem P1_union {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {A B : Set X} :
    Topology.P1 A â†’ Topology.P1 B â†’ Topology.P1 (A âˆª B) := by
  intro hA hB
  dsimp [Topology.P1] at hA hB âŠ¢
  intro x hx
  cases hx with
  | inl hA_mem =>
      have hAx : x âˆˆ closure (interior A) := hA hA_mem
      have h_subset : closure (interior A) âŠ† closure (interior (A âˆª B)) := by
        have hIntSubset : interior A âŠ† interior (A âˆª B) := by
          have h_sub : A âŠ† A âˆª B := Set.subset_union_left
          exact interior_mono h_sub
        exact closure_mono hIntSubset
      exact h_subset hAx
  | inr hB_mem =>
      have hBx : x âˆˆ closure (interior B) := hB hB_mem
      have h_subset : closure (interior B) âŠ† closure (interior (A âˆª B)) := by
        have hIntSubset : interior B âŠ† interior (A âˆª B) := by
          have h_sub : B âŠ† A âˆª B := Set.subset_union_right
          exact interior_mono h_sub
        exact closure_mono hIntSubset
      exact h_subset hBx
